title: Little Resident Package
seo_title: Little Resident Package - Luxury Hotel Offers in NYC - WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: Let your Little Resident delight in their very own WestHouse experience with a plush personalized WestHouse teddy bear, a delicious delivery of milk and cookies, and a cozy child robe to snuggle in for duration of stay. An optional child-friendly city tour to iconic New York locations is also available for an additional cost.
contents: Let your Little Resident delight in their very own WestHouse Hotel New York experience with a plush personalized WestHouse Hotel New York teddy bear, a delicious delivery of milk and cookies, and a cozy child robe to snuggle in for duration of stay. An optional child-friendly city tour to iconic New York locations is also available for an additional cost.
